alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

Thanks for applying to run an event in the Canterbury district.

We'll be in touch by email within 8 working days to confirm if there is any further information we need to finalise your booking.

If you need to update us in the meantime you can view the details of your case and contact us online

Thanks,
Canterbury City Council
alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.subject: Your event booking receipt {{ case.reference }}

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

Thanks for applying to run an event in the Canterbury district. This emails confirms your booking.

Reference: {{ case.reference }}

If you need to update us before you hold your event you can view the details of your case and contact us online

Thanks,
Canterbury City Council
alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.subject: Confirmation of your event booking {{ case.reference }}

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

We've now reviewed your event application.

To confirm your booking we ask that you provide the following by {{ case.values.deadline.value }}

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

You can find guidance and templates for additional documents on our website.

If you need to update us about your case you can view the details of your case and contact us online

Thanks,
Canterbury City Council
alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.subject: An update on your event booking {{ case.reference }}

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.html_body:
Hi,

A citizen has left a message for you on case {{ case.reference }}

View the case online

key.label: E4 Email staff about new customer interaction

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.subject: Citizen has left a message for you {{ case.reference }}

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

A message has been left for you about your public event booking (reference: {{ case.reference }})

You can read and respond to the message online

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council

key.label: E6 Email customer about new staff message

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.subject: An update on your event booking {{ case.reference }}

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

Your event booking (reference: {{ case.reference }}) has been cancelled. The reason for cancellation is:

{{ case.values.reason_for_cancellation.value }}

You can view the details of your case and contact us online.

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.subject: Event order {{ case.reference }} has been cancelled

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

We've now reviewed your event application.

To confirm your booking we ask that you provide the following by {{ case.values.deadline.value }}:

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

Because your event includes a road closure you will also need to pay a road closure fee of £120 before this date. You can pay this online now by quoting the reference {{ case.reference }}

You can find guidance and templates for additional documents on our website.

If you need to update us about your case you can view the details of your case and contact us online

Thanks,
Canterbury City Council

key.label: E16 Email customer road closure payment details

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.subject: Road closure payment needed for event booking {{ case.reference }}

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.html_body:
Hi,

The deadline has now passed for events order {{ case.reference }} to complete the requirements listed below. If this has been done you can confirm the booking now, otherwise you need to cancel it or it will automatically be confirmed in two working days.

View and update the case online

Reservation conditions for this case:

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

key.label: E15 Last chance to cancel an event

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.subject: Last chance to cancel reserved booking {{ case.reference }}

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

This is just a reminder that before your event you will need to have completed the following:

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

You can find guidance and templates for additional documents on our website.

If you've already done this then you can ignore this email. If not you will need to have completed it by {{ case.values.deadline.value }} or we may cancel your event booking.

If you need to update us about your case you can view the details of your case and contact us online

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.subject: A reminder about your event order {{ case.reference }}

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.html_body:
Hi,

The event order {{ case.reference }} was reserved with the following conditions:

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

The deadline for these to be completed is {{ case.values.deadline.value }}

You can confirm that these have been received online now. If they haven't then we will send the customer a reminder.
alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.subject: Event booking {{ case.reference }} still needs confirming

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.html_body:

This is just a reminder that before your event you will need to have completed the following:

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

You can find guidance and templates for additional documents on our website.

If you've already done this then you can ignore this email. If not you will need to have completed it by {{ case.values.deadline.value }} or we may cancel your event booking.

If you need to update us about your case you can view the details of your case and contact us online

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.subject: Event booking {{ case.reference }} still needs confirming

alert-email-template::case-type::apply-t.html_body:
Hi,

A new event application has been submitted in the Canterbury district, reference: {{ case.reference }}

You can view the details of this case and leave a comment for the customer online

Please leave any initial comments for the customer in the next five working days. We will then provisionally confirm or reject the application, and provide the customer with any details they need on next steps.

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
